Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] seeds.txt does not exist error when run heritrix HEAD on windows2003
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=196832670

This is the first time I run heritrix 1.3 on windows.
The 1.6 vesion of JobConfigureUtils.java doesn't work,too.
After add  Profiles/seeds.txt and Profiles/order.xml into conf
dir.,heritrix works fine on windows.

Maybe this is a bug after move heritrix's confligure file into heritrix.jar.

Ansi


On Wed, 8 Dec 2004 09:02:11 -0000, Kristinn Sigurdsson <kris@...> wrote:
> 
> I take it this was working for you before?
>  
> The only relevant change I can see has been made lately is to
> src/java/org/archive/crawler/admin/ui/JobConfigureUtils.java
> Stack made some changes yesterday to fix a bug with reading seeds. That
> probably broke something on Windows. Try reverting to version 1.6 of that
> file and see it that works. If so, Stack broke something, although I don't
> see anything suspicious in his commit.
>  
> - Kris
> 
> 
> 
> 
> -----Original Message-----
> From: ansi [mailto:mymaillist@...] 
> Sent: 8. desember 2004 08:02
> To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [archive-crawler] seeds.txt does not exist error when run heritrix
> HEAD on windows2003
> 
> hi,everyone
>

>
